mapper.select: select result_id, tree_species_id, img_data, alt_text from ui.phenology_observation_result_img where result_id = #{resultId} and tree_species_id = #{treeSpeciesId}
select id, title, description, severity, display_from_dat, display_to_dat from ui.announcement where display_from_dat <= now() and display_to_dat >= now() order by severity desc
select id, title, description, severity, display_from_dat, display_to_dat from ui.announcement order by mod_dat desc
mapper.insert: insert into ui.announcement (title, description, severity, display_from_dat, display_to_dat, cre_dat, mod_dat, cre_usr, mod_usr) values ( #{a.title}, #{a.description}, #{a.severity}, #{a.displayFromDate}, #{a.displayToDate}, now(), now(), #{user}, #{user} )
mapper.select: select ( select count(0) from tree_data.city ) as cities, ( select count(0) from tree_data.tree ) as tree, ( select count(0) from tree_data.tree_species ) as tree_species, ( select count(0) from tree_data.phenology ) as phenology, ( select count(0) from tree_data.phenology_observation ) as phenology_observation, ( select count(0) from tree_data.beacon ) as beacon, ( select count(0) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data
select date_trunc('day', check_dat) "time", count(0) "value" from tree_data.beacon_settings where check_dat > date_trunc('day', now()) - INTERVAL '14 day' group by 1
select date_trunc('day', observe_dat) "time", count(0) "value" from tree_data.phenology where observe_dat > date_trunc('day', now()) - INTERVAL '14 day' group by 1

select ( select min(temperature) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_temp_min, ( select min(temperature) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_temp_avg, ( select max(temperature) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_temp_max, ( select min(humidity) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_humidity_min, ( select avg(humidity) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_humidity_avg, ( select max(humidity) from tree_data.beacon_data ) as beacon_data_humidity_max
